      • addCustomer

        public static void addCustomer​(java.lang.String Customer_Name,
                               java.lang.String Address,
                               java.lang.String Postal_Code,
                               java.lang.String Phone,
                               java.lang.String Create_Date,
                               java.lang.String Created_By,
                               java.sql.Timestamp Last_Update,
                               java.lang.String Last_Updated_By,
                               int Division_ID)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a customer to the Database.
        Parameters:
        Customer_Name - Name of the customer.
        Address - Address of the customer.
        Postal_Code - zip code of the customer.
        Phone - Phone number of the customer.
        Created_By - Person to create the entry
        Last_Updated_By - Person to most recently update the entry.
        Division_ID - Division ID of the customer.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • addAppointment

        public static void addAppointment​(java.lang.String Title,
                                  java.lang.String Location,
                                  java.lang.String Type,
                                  java.lang.String Description,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime Start,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime End,
                                  java.lang.String Create_Date,
                                  java.lang.String Created_By,
                                  java.sql.Timestamp Last_Update,
                                  java.lang.String Last_Updated_By,
                                  int Customer_ID,
                                  int User_ID,
                                  int Contact_ID)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates appointment in DB.
        Parameters:
        Title - Name of the appointment.
        Description - description of the appointment.
        Location - Location of the appointment.
        Type - Type of appointment.
        Start - Start time of the appointment.
        End - End time of the appointment.
        Create_Date - Date the appointment was created.
        Created_By - Identifies who created the appointment.
        Last_Update - Most recent update to the appointment.
        Last_Updated_By - Identifies who did the last update to the appointment.
        Customer_ID - Unique ID for customer.
        User_ID - Unique ID for user.
        Contact_ID - Unique ID for contact.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
